Für mich - "Der Shooter" schlecht-hin.

1200-1500 stehende server - mit unter - ganz unterschiedlichen möglichkeiten.

Ob man sich nun als "Pro" austoben möchte - oder 
- als Anfänger: mal ganz alleine, bzw mit bot´s trainieren oder alles kennenlernen möchte.

mit der (standarttaste) "k" kann man "auf fast jeder map" - (mit einem Headset) direkt fragen stellen,
und auf den deutschen servern- habe ich damit sogar ganz gute erfahrungen gemacht. 

Allerdings sei auch hier dazu gesagt: dass es sehr viele Spinner gibt -  auch in CSS.

Ich gebe dem spiel 87 von 100 punkten. 
Daher halte ich den preis von 20,- € auch gerechtfertigt.

Allerdings gibt es auch Angebote - wie letztes Weihnachten - was - richtig klasse war.
>> Die Geduldigen sind hier - wahrlich im Vorteil <<

Hey guys, well counterstrike source, i have to say its a great arcade shooter which takes the FPS genre back to barebones play style. Comparing it to todays current call of duty's!!! So no perk packages or leveling up, just all out great weapons and fierce competition via the online servers. My ratings a 8 outta 10 and a must own for any FPS fan!!!
i have not played this game much (as you can tell) but with the few hours ive played i have enjoyed .

Even though it's an old game, CSS is still one of the best fps games I've played so far. It is a bit glitchy as the hit boxes don't usually follow the player model, but those seems to be minor issues as many players still have fun playing it.

Since This Game is Basically my new addiction im gonna write a review telling you to buy it, its more addicting then CS Go and well i kinda like it more in some ways. Its a Challenge its a lot harder to get kills in Source then in GO mainly because there are a lot of pros playing on the servers.
If it ain't broke don't fix it. I guess.

This game series has enhanced the fps genre to what it is today making fps gameplay go to whole new level by adding advanced hit boxes and also a very good competitive vibe as well as maybe one of the best fps matchmaking systems i have seen in the gaming industry. this game can be played by the casual gamer as well as the hardcore. for the casual it offers a variety of different fun game modes such as jailbreka gun game and minigames . for the hardcre u hsvae the standard tournament style gamenodes of counter strike hostage situation or defuse. if u are a fan of the fps genre and are considered mainly a hardcore gamer this game is definenitly for u. although a little challenging at the beginning for pc beginners or people not used to the fps genre it just takes a little getting used to and you will become great at the fps genre. this game i also recommend to people beggining the fps genre on pc becaise of the simplicity of the controls literary all u have to useis the numpad, wasd, ctrl and shift, an the mouse
i love this game because its so fun and its just awesome
Let's face facts, this game along with it's older counterpart, CS 1.6, set the standard for FPS games.  And it's still the standard.  Replayability after a decade, still high. 10/10

It's Counter-Strike, but prettier. Shoot things, play the objective, be strategetic, or muck about and play some random game mode that requires no skill. The mythical learning cliff that Counter-Strike is so infamous for exists, but it's not impossible to climb, or avoid altogether. There are plenty of "noob-friendly" servers and the game isn't so frustratingly hard that one may rage quit after only a few matches. I'd still recommend Global Offensive over Source, but if your computer isn't able to handle CS:GO, this is a fantastic alternative.
Самый лучший шутер всех времён и народов (не считая CS 1.6)
